text: flytdbr al'insan: kayf khalaq allah taeamih aldhy hu qwam hyath? anna sababna alma' ealaa al'ard sabbana, thuma shqqnaha bima 'akhrijna minha min nabat shta, fa'anbatna fiha hbana, wenbana welfana lldwab, wzytwnana wanakhlana wahadayiq ezymt alashjar, wthmarana wkla taneamwn biha 'antum waneamkm
